title: Digital Watch Face - Slider
summary: Stylish watch face with weather, a clean look and vibrant choice of colors!
description: Stylish, minimal digital watch face with weather, a unique clean look and vibrant choice of colors.Looks great on both round and square devices!Change settings in the watch face configuration app, to change themes just tap on the watch face.★ Tap on the Watch Face to cycle through themes★ Temperature information based on current location★ Choose between C or F temperature units★ Choose between 12 or 24 hour format★ Display the date or hide it for a cleaner look★ Choose between 7 bright sets of colors★ Looks great on both round and square devices★ Clean dark look for ambient mode
descriptionHTML:
Stylish, minimal digital watch face with weather, a unique clean look and vibrant choice of colors.
Looks great on both round and square devices!

Change settings in the watch face configuration app, to change themes just tap on the watch face.


★ Tap on the Watch Face to cycle through themes
★ Temperature information based on current location
★ Choose between C or F temperature units
★ Choose between 12 or 24 hour format
★ Display the date or hide it for a cleaner look
★ Choose between 7 bright sets of colors
★ Looks great on both round and square devices
★ Clean dark look for ambient mode
